component.name: Massif-Visualizer
component.summary: A visualizer for Valgrind Massif data files.

description.p: Massif Visualizer is a tool that - who'd guess that - visualizes massif data. You run your application in Valgrind with --tool=massif and then open the generated massif.out.%pid in the visualizer. Gzip or Bzip2 compressed massif files can also be opened transparently.

ul.li: Interactive chart of memory consumption over time.
Detailed snapshot analysis with callgraph visualization (requires KGraphViewer).
